mapper.insert: insert into user_info (userId, openId, nick, icon, name, sex, tel, weixinNum, weixinPic, signature, createTime) values (#{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixinnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixinpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_info set openId = #{openid,jdbcType=CHAR}, nick = #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixinNum = #{weixinnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixinPic = #{weixinpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select userId, openId, nick, icon, name, sex, tel, weixinNum, weixinPic, signature, createTime from user_info where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select userId, openId, nick, icon, name, sex, tel, weixinNum, weixinPic, signature, createTime from user_info
